name: PDS1
description: PDS 1 uses the historical growth of plastic recycling in the US from 1990 to 2018 and extrapolates that rate globally

name: PDS2
description: PDS2 is based on Ellen Macarthur Foundation Projections that 53% of non- durable plastics could be recycled by 2050; and a 70% yield

name: PDS3
description: PDS3 is based on the McKinsey prediction that 60% of plastic production could be met with recycled plastics by 2050
